page.title: 17DISASTER 3 AT CRICKHOWELL
page.content: I woke up one morning in December to see a note by the front door saying "School has burnt down. This is not a joke" .I rushed to school and was amazed at what I saw. The roof of the whole of one end of the school had burnt away. Further problems were in store for us when we discovered that the asbestos which had been left in the roof to be removed in the holidays was now exposed and had been blown throughout the school. The school was again closed down for a week while the mess was cleared up and arrangements made for the accomodation of those pupils now without a teaching home.
